message.gettingAntimatterPerSec: You are getting {antimatter} antimatter per second.
message.adsProduceFasterPerTickSpeedUpgrade: ADs produce {rate} faster per Tickspeed upgrade
message.tickSpeedUpgradesGiveToAllAds: Tickspeed upgrades give {rate} to all ADs
message.pressKeyToOpenHotkeyList: Press {question} to open the hotkey list.

hotKey.modifierKeyDescription: Shift is a modifier key that shows additional information on certain things and adjusts the function of certain buttons.
hotKey.autobuyerControlsDescription:
Alt is a modifier key that, when pressed in conjunction with any key that has a corresponding autobuyer, will toggle said autobuyer.
When pressing both Alt and Shift, you can toggle buying singles or buying max for the Antimatter Dimension
hotKey.tabMovementDescription: Using the Arrow Keys will cycle you through the game's pages. The Up and Down arrows cycle you through tabs, and the Left and Right arrows cycle you through that tab's subtabs.
hotKey.numpadSupportDescription: Due to technical reasons, pressing a numpad key will purchase 10 of a Dimension if possible, but pressing a numpad key with {SHIFT} will not buy a single Dimension. It may instead, depending on your device, cause the page to scroll or change game tabs. {ALT} will still work as expected.

dimensionBoost.header: You are about to do a Dimension Boost Reset
dimensionBoost.reset: This will reset your Antimatter and Antimatter Dimensions. Are you sure you want to do this?
dimensionBoost.withoutReset: This will not actually reset anything due to an upgrade you have which prevents Antimatter and Antimatter Dimensions from being reset in this situation. You will still gain the multiplier from the Boost, as usual.

sacrifice.over9000Message: Dimensional Sacrifice will give you a boost to the 8th Antimatter Dimension based on the amount of 1st Antimatter Dimensions you had at the time of Sacrificing.
sacrifice.message: Dimensional Sacrifice will remove all of your 1st through 7th Antimatter Dimensions (with the cost and multiplier unchanged), for a boost to the 8th Antimatter Dimension based on the total amount of 1st Antimatter Dimensions sacrificed. It will take time to regain production.
sacrifice.multiplier: Multiplier is currently {current} and will increase to {next} on Dimensional Sacrifice.

antimatterGalaxy.distant: Distant Antimatter Galaxy | Distant Antimatter Galaxies
antimatterGalaxy.remote: Remote Antimatter Galaxy | Remote Antimatter Galaxies

eternityChallenge.fullyCompleted: This Challenge is already fully completed!

dilation.gainMoreTpInDilation: Percentage to gain more TP in Dilation

automation.name: Automation
automation.gameSpeedDescription:
Autobuyer intervals and time-based settings are always real time and therefore
unaffected by anything which may alter how fast the game itself is running.
automation.autobuyerChallengeUnlock: Challenges for upgrading autobuyers are unlocked by reaching Infinity.
automation.unlimitedAutobuyerBulk: Autobuyers with no displayed bulk have unlimited bulk by default.
automation.autobuyerBulkUpgrade: Antimatter Dimension Autobuyers can have their bulk upgraded once interval is below {ms} ms.
automation.instantAutobuyerTrigger: Autobuyers with 'Instant' interval will trigger every game tick ({gameTickLength}).

interval.needChallenge: Complete the challenge to upgrade interval

saveTimer.disabled: There is nothing left to save.
